description:
T1036 - Cut Back Branches to Expose Lamp Post & Light (Group 2)
T1037 - Crown Reduce 1 X Ash Tree by 2.0/2.5Mtrs
T1038 - Crown Reduce 1 X Ash Tree by 2.0/2.5Mtrs
T1040 - Crown Reduce 1 X Sycamore Tree by 2.0/2.5Mtrs
T1041 - Crown Reduce 1 X Sycamore Tree by 2.0/2.5Mtrs
T1042 - Fell 1 X Cherry Tree to Ground Level
T1043 - Crown Reduce 1 X Sycamore Tree by 2.0/2.5Mtrs
T1044 - Fell 1 X Maple Tree to Ground Level
T1047 - Fell 1 X Dead Hawthorn Tree to Ground Level
T1048 - Reduce all Side Laterals 1 X Oak Tree by 3.0Mtrs to Leave Nearly upright Crown
T1049 - Reduce Height 1 X Conifer Tree by 4.0Mtrs to Reduce Crown Weight & Reduce Wind Sail Effect
T1091 - Remove Deadwood greater than 50mm diameter 1 X Large Oak Tree
T1092 - Remove Deadwood greater than 50mm diameter 1 X Large Oak Tree. And Crown Lift to 3.0Mtrs
T1093 - Remove Deadwood greater than 50mm 1 X Oak Tree
T1094 - Remove Deadwood greater than 50mm 1 X Oak Tree
T1095 - Remove Deadwood greater than 50mm 1 X Oak Tree
T1096 - Fell 1 X Ash Tree to Ground Level
T1098 - Remove Both Limbs to Height of Tennis Court Fence 1 X Oak Tree
T1107 - Raise Crowns as necessary to allow grass cutting (Orchard Group 6)
T1108 - Raise Crowns on Grass Side to 3.0Mtrs & Remove all Encroachment to School Buildings back to Boundary (Boundary Group 7)
T1109 - Totally Remove Branch Encroaching on House & Reduce rest of Crown by 3.0Mtrs (30%)
T1110 - Remove all Deadwood 1 X Oak Tree & Reduce Lever Arm by 3.0Mtrs to Live Point (Check for Roosting Bats)
Works to Trees covered by a TPO sought under application 1107/21. (Summary).
decision_conditions:
Unless the Council consider it unjustified, it is a statutory requirement to replace trees in Conservation Areas that are removed because they are dead and/or dangerous. In this instance, the Council will require the trees notified for removal to be replaced. The position of the trees need not be identical to that of those removed. The planting shall be undertaken in the first planting season [November to March] or part thereof following the commencement of works

Failure to comply with this statutory requirement may result in the issue of a 'Tree Replacement Notice' under section 207 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
site_name: Church Of St Thomas Of Canterbury
